Class ReferenceManager

java.lang.Object
  ReferenceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
public class ReferenceManager
extends Object
implements Comparable

A class to support all operations of the program Hold the collections of projects and references and methods to format these objects before passing to GUI Support the logic of the program

Version:
2010.10.26
Author:
Tin Huynh

public void addNewProject(String newName,
                          String newBriefDesc,
                          ArrayList<String> refList,
                          String noteText,
                          String noteDate)
                   throws IOException
Connect to the text file that stores project data Call the constructor of class Project that calls the method to save project data to file

Parameters:
newName - name of the new project
newBriefDesc - brief description of the new project
refList - a list of reference number to be added under this project
noteText - text of the new Note
noteDate - date created of the new Note
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs when input or output from file
FileNotFoundException - if the textfile cannot be found
